text: 2:11-12 Matyu 24:5; 24:11; Rom 1:24; 1:32; 1 Timoti 4:1; 2 Timoti 4:4God kamaghsua, gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim guizɨn akamɨn itir puvatɨgha arazir kurabagh amua bar akongeziba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim akar ifavarimɨn ikɨva, Godɨn kotɨn ivezir kuram iniam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God men nɨghnɨzibagh amizɨ, me paza nɨghnɨsi.
